jobDescription: Job Title: Data Scientist / Data AnalystLocation: Milpitas, CADuration: Full TimeJob Description:- Has 4+ years of experience working with quantitative methods, ideally integrated with qualitative methodsHas designed and executed multiple quantitative research studies across industriesAdvanced statistical analysis (clustering, regression, conjoint)Web analytics and analysisSurvey design and analysisExperience in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics (such as Python, R, Matlab, C++, Java or Go), and with SQL.
